archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: FPOC
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation: FPOC Fraud Prevention Operation Center tool. Developed to monitor and prevent diffrent fraud threats i.e. Trojans. The system is aimed to be integrated to IKP/IKF mobile Apps (IKP/IKF) C&I Online and Kassa/Boka. Related to sytem FLIPP (transaktion logging)
